content.text:
# Postage stamps and postal history of the Dominican Republic

The Dominican Republic became independent from Spain in 1865 and produced its own stamps from that date.
Gallery of stamps of the Dominican Republic
Dominican Republic 1879 Sc34.jpg|1879 issue
Dominican Republic 1880 Sc36-44.jpg|1880 set
Dominican Republic 1881 Sc45-53.jpg|1881 set
Dominican Republic 1883 Sc87.jpg|1883 issue
1866 Un R RepDominicana C86 Mi8.jpg|An early 1866 stamp with a British office cancel
